content: ravelry download is the english version norwegian version is free from dale garn/house of yarn at the link shown this was a ready-to-wear pattern originally until knitters wrote to dalegarn in large numbers requesting a hand knitting pattern dalegarn has now graciously obliged us and it is free for a limited time the english version is now available for download the sweater has colorwork fitted waist stand up collar and front placket zipper with buttoned cuffs due to the intricate design baby ull is used at a fine gauge on small needles it is a very chart intensive pattern so a magnet board will make knitting it easier enjoy
